title: Zilean BS OP
body:
So in typical Riot fashion, they decide to remake a champion (probably without due testing) and  overshoot the mark.
Zone control, low mana costs, cc , good damage and low cd ult makes grandfather clock one nasty pastie.
Plus his laning harrassment is off the hook.

Any anyone else's thoughts on this glorified wristwatch?

replies.body: im going to agree that new zilean looks pretty strong, with his q spamming in teamfights, you are forced not to go to certain area to avoid getting hit by bombs
does it even stun champs? i legit didnt get stunned at all in the game i vsed a new zil....his ult was on a much longer CD than the old W spam, im certain...or he was just terrible at ulting lol

His Q only stuns if it hits the same target twice before exploding. As for his ult, it's a shorter base cooldown (down to 120/90/60 from 180) but, as I'm sure you're aware, Rewind no longer affects it. Probably just that one was bad with ults.

i am WELL aware of the changes...

in 60 seconds you can get easily 6+ Ws off with decent CDR even at lvl 6. the only real difference is the lvl 16 ult. lvl 11 ult ends up about the same CD. but it was between lvl 8-14 that he wasnt ulting anywhere near as often as expected...
unless W CD got nerfed too...

the Q stun seemed odd, because i would be carrying a ball and never get stunned...again, most likely a bad zil... but a few times i saw the AOE stun on minions an i swear i was standing in with them...and not stunned...as vi...

It's a skillshot.

Can you not dodge abilities?
New ZIl is garbage compared to the old one, his Q logic sucks, it should prioritize targets with a bomb already on them.
